text: Warren Blatt (born 1962) is an American genealogist and computer engineer who is the Managing Director of JewishGen, an online source for researching Jewish roots. He is the author/coauthor of a number of books including Getting Started in Jewish Genealogy (with Gary Mokotoff). Blatt received the Lifetime Achievement Award of the International Association of Jewish Genealogical Societies in 2004. == Works and publications== * * * * * ==References== Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:American genealogists Category:Jewish genealogy Category:Jewish American historians Category:American male non-fiction writers Category:21st-century American historians
title: Warren Blatt
